objectives: Students will discuss hobbies and free time using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Fantasy themed scenarios related to hobbies and free time
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining hobbies and free time content with Fantasy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore hobbies and free time through a Fantasy lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a magical or fantastical situation involving hobbies and free time

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to hobbies and free time in a fantasy context
Students engage in fantasy themed role-play about hobbies and free time using expert register
Students create original fantasy themed content about hobbies and free time in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe hobbies and free time in a Fantasy scenario?
What magical or enchanted might be involved in hobbies and free time?
Can you create a Fantasy story about hobbies and free time?
How does hobbies and free time change when viewed through a Fantasy perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this fantasy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Fantasy situation involving hobbies and free time
roles: Character A: Using expert register in fantasy context
Character B: Responding in expert register within fantasy theme

topic_genre_blend: hobbies and free time with magical
hobbies and free time with enchanted
hobbies and free time with mystical

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Fantasy theme: Magic, mythical creatures, imaginary worlds

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Fantasy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
